components.name: Section
Section Header

children.name: Subtitle

children.attributes:
{
  // HTML element based on type prop
  as: type === "textarea" 
    	? "textarea"
  		: "input",
  type: type === "textarea"
    		? undefined
  			: type,
  isInvalid: error ? true : undefined,
  ref: inputRef,
  ...inputProps
}

children.name: Icon

  size: "sm",
  role: "status",
  'aria-hidden': true,
  className: "align-baseline text-primary"
}
